paragraph_above.description: Currier A-like text block above diagram

spokes.description: Short 1-2 token spokes radiating from center

segmented_middle_rings.description: Middle rings divided into sectors by drawn lines (like spoke dividers)
segmented_middle_rings.example: Line 2a, 2b = ring 2, sectors a and b

inner_rings.description: 2 rings closer to center, after the sector dividers end

special_features.dividers: Straight drawn lines separating the 3 text lines
special_features.differs_from: Not like typical Currier A paragraphs - more structured

segmented_rings.meaning: Number = concentric ring layer, Letter = angular sector
segmented_rings.physical: Drawn lines divide rings into pie-slice sectors

red_ink_usage.significance: Connects outer boundary to center element

drawn_divider_lines.f67r2_diagram: Radial lines dividing rings into sectors
drawn_divider_lines.f67r2_below: Horizontal lines separating the 3 text lines

user_observations: f67r1: Currier A-like paragraph above diagram
f67r1: 3 outer rings with 1-2 token spokes
f67r2: Outer ring in RED text
f67r2: Inner rings subdivided by drawn spoke-like lines into groups
f67r2: 2 more rings near center after dividers end
f67r2: 3 horizontal text lines below with drawn dividers between them
f67r2: Center of the 3 lines uses same RED ink as outer ring
